title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2575/97 of 15 December 1997 fixing the amount of the flat-rate premium for certain fishery products during the 1998 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2575/97 of 15 December 1997 fixing the amount of the flat-rate premium for certain fishery products during the 1998 fishing year (Text with EEA relevance)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1998 fishing year, the amount of the flat-rate premium for the products listed in Annex VI to Council Regulation (EEC) No 3759/92 (3) shall be as follows:
(a) freezing and storage of products, whole, gutted with head, or cut:
ECU 120/tonne, for the first month
ECU 17/tonne, per additional month;
(b) filleting, freezing and storage:
ECU 200/tonne, for the first month
ECU 17/tonne, per additional month.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 January 1998.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1997.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
